snippet: Concerned groups said they would shut down a nearby port over fears about radioactive byproducts from the Lynas plant.
abstract: Opponents of a rare earth refinery in Malaysia refuse to back down after authorities give Lynas approval to proceed; concerned groups say they will blockade the nearby port of Kuantan over fears about radioactive byproducts from the plant.
lead_paragraph: Concerned groups said they would shut down a nearby port over fears about radioactive byproducts from the Lynas plant.

headline.seo: Protests Promised Over License for Rare Earth Plant in Malaysia
headline.main: Opponents of Malaysia Rare Earth Plant Promise to Protest
headline.print_headline: Opponents of Malaysia Rare Earth Plant Promise to Protest
